general_advisory: Watch for rain before applying pesticides. In fallow uplands, utilize recent rainfall for short-duration low water requiring crops. Regular surveillance for insect pests is recommended. High humidity may lead to pest and disease build-up in crops which calls for plant protection measures.

advisory: Current weather may favour blast disease in rice. Control it with recommended fungicides. Watch out for stem borer and leaf folder infestations.
Develop drainage system to avoid waterlogging. Watch out for aphids and army worm infestations.
Prepare field and sow high-yielding groundnut varieties. Treat seeds before sowing.
Sow pre-rabi black gram and green gram using recommended practices.
Sow pre-rabi sesame with proper spacing and nutrient application.
Watch out for downy mildew and spray recommended fungicides if observed.
Complete nursery sowing for tomatoes. Manage diseases with organic treatments.
Manage leaf curl and mosaic diseases with recommended insecticides. Destroy infected plants immediately.
